website_summaries.verdict: This mirror has just about everything you could hope for, except the light may not be bright enough.
cons: Some have complained that the light is too dim

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this mirror except that the light is ...
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mirror except that the light is way too dim! (Thus the 3 star rating :-/) The light was the main reason why I spent this much money on a mirror. if it was brighter...I would definitely have given it 5 stars! I guess I'll have to order the light bulbs that other reviewers suggested. Other than that...it's great! Very easy to install, pretty, sturdy and folds up nicely out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DeFelice

customer_reviews.title: I loved it for a while. Not now.
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! My husband installed it however. He is a carpenter and was thoroughly aggravated with the quality of the mounting hardware and used heavier duty hardware from his shop. So, you may want to keep in mind who has to put the dang thing up. Update today, March 14, 2019. Less than 18 months later, the dang thing is broken and headed for the trash. One of the screws in the flexible arm has literally broken off. The washer is worn out, not flat like normal, but warped. I only used this daily for about 20 minutes. I will be buying another, but certainly not this brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pyles

customer_reviews.title: replacement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to replace an identical item that lasted 8 years before the turn switch broke. I would like it if the light were a little brighter and the magnification were more than 5x, but I purchased this for the ease of installing it on the existing, identical brackets that were previously installed. I bought an "open box" item, but it appeared to be brand new, never opened. The box just had some slight damage to it, but the item had no damage at all. Great price and it works just like my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: akincl

customer_reviews.title: Better than just okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: If you have any experience at all with mounting things to a wall, then you’ll have no problems putting this mirror up. As other reviewers have noted, the Built in light is quite dim. My wife does use the light, but says it could be brighter. Fortunately there is enough light in the bathroom that it’s not an issue for her. I may do as another reviewer did and investigate retrofitting with a brighter LED. If you don’t think you’ll need a lighted mirror then skip this one and look for something else. If lighting is important, then also keep looking. If you just like the looks of this thing and maybe want a nightlight, then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: BwanaBob

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dimly lit! Heavy, bulky
customer_reviews.text: My opinion on how bright this is: The only time the internal light helps is if you turn all the other lights off in the room - and then it's still way too dim. It's like using a candle to put on makeup with. It's also very heavy - heavy enough I would worry about it coming loose from the wall. It's much thicker than appears on the web page. It's old-school incandescent lamp design in a day that LED's are in. I didn't install it so I gave it a 3 on installation. The positive is that it plugs directly into a receptacle and has a nice looking cord.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: but still wasn't bright or i should say cool enough and realized and was also told that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but my wife says the lighting is too warm and not bright enough, I switched the bulbs for a 35 and 40 watt, but still wasn't bright or i should say cool enough and realized and was also told that the type of bulbs for this unit is on the warm side of the spectrum and I wouldn't find anything on the cooler side. So she reverted back to the Costco one I bought that uses standard light bulbs that you use for indoor home lighting, which I can use a cooler bulb. I'm a little disappointed because I had wall mounted this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love this mirror
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give it a 5-star review is that it would be nice if the lighting brightness and height was adjustable. Otherwise, having both sides (regular and magnified) is extremely helpful for makeup application. I used this mirror in a hotel in Canada and liked it so much that I decided to purchase it for myself! Shipped quickly from Amazon and was easy to install. Not the cheapest mirror but it is worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Bright, perfect magnification, and retains it beauty after 15 years
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased an additional Jerdon HL65G mirror. We bought one over 15 years ago and absolutely love it, but when company stays overnight they use the bathroom that it is installed in. That leaves me sneaking in there to use the mirror when they are gone as I cant see as well in any of the other mirrors we own. Solved the problem: Purchased another one and my husband direct wired it also and its in our master bath. Love love love it. No problems what so ever.Still looks new and have never changed the bulb after 15 years. We are going to buy one for our daughter in law and granddaughter also.
customer_reviews.author: VEG

customer_reviews.title: Ladies, stop leaning over the counter to put on your make up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she didn't have to lean over the counter to get close enough to the mirror to see what she was doing when applying her make-up. While i enjoy watching her lean over the counter, it wasn't great for her back! She uses it all the time and really likes it. It is well designed and looks nice in the bathroom and swings out of the way when not in use. I took a star off, simply because it does plug in and doesn't have a hard wire option, which for some folks might be a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Big W

customer_reviews.title: The installation was very simple and it does a very nice job of lighting her area for applying makeup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her bedroom and she loves it. The installation was very simple and it does a very nice job of lighting her area for applying makeup. Her only complaint is that now she finds my wife in her room applying her makeup thus taking up my daughters space. The light is plenty bright and the dual sided mirror works well for normal and magnification. Everything I needed was included in the package and again installation was a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: High quality, dim light
customer_reviews.text: This came and was very easy to install. Mirrors are high quality. The only complaint I have is the light is not very bright. The magnification is good not sure I wanted to see my wrinkles this close. High quality. If you have a bright bathroom then this will work well.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Looks high end
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Instructions are very clear and it is easy to line up the holes in the wall. The color has some dimension to it so it looks high end. The cord is clear and coiled so even if exposed rather than snaked into the wall) it doesn't look bad. If it makes a difference, the mirror is rather deep at 2". i don't mind that, but you may feel as though it is bulkier than expected. After a few months, i still love it but wish it had multiple light settings. It only has one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Great lighted make-up mirror
customer_reviews.text: I made an easy modification to mount the mirror directly over a rectangular "old-work" electrical box so that there was no need for an electrical cord and plug. It's a great mirror, but it's not as bright as my other similar mirror. -I may try switching out the bulb for an LED equivalent to see if I can make it any brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Wakefj

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: The condo we rented in Hawaii had one of these mirrors, and I loved it. Therefore, I did an on-line search to find one. The magnification can be a bit scary (Hello, wrinkles--whee did you come from?). but it is great for putting on make-up and for getting my prescription eye drops in my eyes and not down my cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to Have This
customer_reviews.text: I used one like this at a hotel and wanted one for my home. It's amazing. Just the right size for our small wall in bathroom. My husband hung it easily. He didn't hard wire it since we had an outlet right below where it was hung. Light is bright. Magnification is perfect so I don't need glasses to pluck eyebrows. Even my husband like it and uses it. Would absolutely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: KrisLeeRN

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact model we saw in a hotel room we had stayed in. We expected something in a hotel to be of a better quality to withstand daily use and abuse. We have had it installed for 2 years now and as expected, it still works and looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Tim A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and style
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife and she loves it. No complaints on brightness and we think it compliments the bathroom. Nice design and style. I like the clear curled cord as it blends in nicely with background. The way to go if your not hardwiring.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Miller

customer_reviews.title: like it lots
customer_reviews.text: I hate that there is a cord! My own fault. I didnt read the description closely enough. However, its a mirror and it does what I need it to do right at the moment. The magnifying side does help out these old eyes. Item came packaged nice and snug and was on time.
customer_reviews.author: michelle s

customer_reviews.title: I use everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I purchased this mirror. It magnifies great and looks very nice in the bathroom. My disappointment is with the light. It is not bright enough to get any help seeing and I don't even use it anymore. Luckily I mounted it where I already have light. Yes I mounted it myself so if I did it anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mirror after using at a hotel (mostly wife using it). It is really nice for getting up close with your face and doing what you need to do. I ordered the plug in model but really didn't like the look of the cord being plugged in after all. So, I wired it directly to the outlet and it looks nice and professional. This was a used item but it looks brand new, came in original box with everything included and wrapped up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: GoVols

customer_reviews.title: Picture and text totally misleading
customer_reviews.text: This mirror needs to be plugged into wall. It is not hard-wired. Nowhere is that mentioned in the text nor seen in the images. I had to reorder another mirror that will be hard-wired to fit my new bathroom remodel. The mirror itself may be great (unknown), but it is just not what is presented.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Eileen Klitsch

customer_reviews.title: We have 3 we love them so much
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 we love them so much , one in each full bath and one in 1/2 bath ... bought first one about 7 or 8 years ago and have not had to replace light bulb yet. Can't imagine not having one
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: I had my contractor hard wire it and it works just great!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for my new bathroom. Note this is not a hardwire item as the picture might make you assume, but a plug into an outlet. I had my contractor hard wire it and it works just great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Photo taker

customer_reviews.title: Could be brighter, but my wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a brighter light in this, but my wife is perfectly happy with how it is. So that's why it's 5 stars. Easy to install, and all of the hardware is included.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Floyd

customer_reviews.title: The light does get a little hot but just a minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: I love the mirror. It gives just enough light to apply makeup or do brows.The magnifier side is just the right strength. Any higher magnification and it would look distorted. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: German Shepherd Mom

customer_reviews.title: Making funny faces
customer_reviews.text: Useful for: putting on makeup, tweezing hairs, making funny faces. Pros: very easy to install. I did not use the screws provided, I screwed directly into a stud to avoid using the drywall anchors and create a bigger hole. 5x magnifying side. Looks great in my bathroom, matches my other fixtures. Cons: none yet (will update if needed 16-June 2015; Purchased 2-June 2015) (seeing skin imperfections due to 5x magnifying class) Used for: tweezing. I gotta see the really fine ones! Packaging: Styrofoam in the packaging. Box was a little dented, product unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara (& Echo)

customer_reviews.title: Needs a brighter LED bulb.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and it looks nice. Needs an LED light inside that is brighter though.
customer_reviews.author: James McPherson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! Great quality, secures to the wall perfectly and really brings a nice ambiance to a guest bathroom. I am only slightly concerned if a guest happens to forget to turn the light off. It gets hot quick. I wish it came with an automatic on/off light feature.
customer_reviews.author: B. Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror for Small Vanity
customer_reviews.text: A great mirror for the price. The light won't light a room but serves its purpose for applying make-up. Quality is good and extension arm works well - moves in and out smoothly. Lays flat against the wall which is nice with my small bathroom / vanity area.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Three

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy the better one!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in hopes that it would be like the kind we had in a hotel room on a recent stay. Nope! It's heavy, so installing it will require more screws than what comes with the mirror, otherwise it pulls out from the wall (yes, I know about installing it into studs- too bad the only place to install it in our bathroom, there were no studs). The light was not very bright either. Very disappointed in it so we returned it and spent more money on the Simple Human one. Now THAT one is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Haven

customer_reviews.title: ordered it from amazon while she was carrying on about how great it was and surprised her when we got home ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this mirror. Got the name of this particular mirror off the back of one in a hotel we was staying at last summer. my wife insisted on having one. ordered it from amazon while she was carrying on about how great it was and surprised her when we got home and it was on the back porch. mounted easily. it is very sturdy once mounted. mirror is clear and has held up well, even with our 4 year old caught pulling it down constantly to pretend she is putting her makeup on. the magnified side is great and clear when needed. buy one with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: anthodavis

customer_reviews.title: The mirror works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was easy to install and provides great light and magnification. I errantly thought I was ordering a mirror that offered regular amplification as well magnification (in otherwords, you would flip the mirror if you wanted magnification). Unfortunately, that is not what I ordered. But the mirror still works fine and I wasn't inclined to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but not bright enough. I want to see every wrinkle, eyebrows, extra hair etc - and I can't unfortunately. We went out and bought a brighter bulb and that definitely helped. Installation was easy, well made.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend so she can do her up close make-up stuff. She is thrilled about it and she uses it every day. She says it works great with no complaints. I asked if the light was not bright enough and she indicated if it was brighter, it might it too hard to look into the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Bogeyman

customer_reviews.title: Just what my wife wanted...happy wife...happy life.
customer_reviews.text: I hard-wired the unit by installing a junction box and then disconnecting the supplied power plug and wiring the unit to the power source. The only negatives are 1) incandescent bulb and 2) the mounting base is flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Farkas

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without this mirror set up in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without this mirror set up in my bathroom. I can finally apply my make-up more professionally. The lamp itself is very attractive with a brushed silvertone finish that matches our bathroom. It does swing out of the way and since we have a his and hers sinks....it's on my side of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: tleoniy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is beautiful. Be aware the light is not reallly bright, but like other buyer said, if you have good lighting in your bathroom/vanity, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D. Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for awhile now and it still works great! It is rich and elegant in appearance. Adds to the spa look of my bathroom. The magnification and light brightness is just right...when I apply my cosmetics and then walk outside, the application isn't too heavy as it tended to be when I applied under my usual lighting. It also helps me see what needs to be blended in better..always a plus for us ladies! My hubby said the install was easy. I like that it uses a easy to find bulb. No negatives with this one and the price on Amazon was less than half of what it is at Bed Bath and Beyond!
customer_reviews.author: C. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Needs an LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: Good mirror but the light is an incandescent bulb and the unit gets very hot after a minute. Trying to find a bright enough LED to change it out. We unplug it after using it, afraid of it overheating.
customer_reviews.author: Gdv

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: Saw this mirror at a rental house where we were staying and loved it. Got home, ordered one for myself, installed it in my vanity area, and am loving it! That was 3 years ago and it is still in perfect working order.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish the magnification was higher and I wish the size was at least 1" larger - but for the price I am pleased. I've had it about 6 months now and I did hang in my bathroom and still use the plug in (it is not wired in) The mount seems a bit weak - but I am careful with the extension and usually leave it stretched out - but can push against wall if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Impressive mirror, gorgeous finish
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the bathroom. Greatly enjoy for hygenien and makeup application. The brush bronze look is very impressive. Matches the other brush bronze accessories. Also the light is perfect for late night trips to the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great for shaving
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to install. Bought a second for another bathroom. I also purchased the replacement bulbs but note that the light ships with a spare bulb. I guess I missed that detail in the writeup.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. Looks great. Works great. Easy to mount on the wall. I wish it was brighter. But my wife, who is the user of the mirror says ‘no, it is bright enough and I love it.’ I looked at and reviewed a lot of these. I don’t think any of them are very bright. But it works great for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: So the price is great, I'll start with that. I like the look, it doesn't look cheap. The mirrors work well. The bad. The bulb is honestly terrible. It's a soft white that is quite dim. I highly recommend purchasing an LED replacement. I've noticed that the arm does not fold straight, it's slightly bending under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great company!
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described. I didn't care for the low lumen incandescent bulb. I will switch it out with a LED type that's a candelabra base. Besides the overall great quality of the product their customer service was very generous in helping me out with a part issue that was really my fault. I will definitely recommend their products!
customer_reviews.author: ladybran

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Mointed it to her exact height on the wall, Had it for a while. she loves it, Tries to get me to use it!
customer_reviews.author: History guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I could be without it now. It's not easy to do my makeup when I'm away as I've gotten a bit spoiled by this. The lighting is perfect, and I can tilt to my needs. I've had for two years now without problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice and sturdy and easy to install. The light is warm white and the cord is clear. If the light was a little better I would have given it 5 stars but overall the size, color, cord and function is really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror. I hung this on my bathroom wall and then had to remount. It's a bit heavy, as you might expect, and I failed to actually hit the studs (thanks to the world's worst stud finder). New stud finder in hand, I rehung it and it's solid. My point is: Find the studs. I like all the pivot points on this mirror as well as its ability to angle the mirror itself. The light is bright enough and the magnification sufficient for my needs - tweezing brows.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Mirror is good. Light is nearly useless.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent quality mirror. I've had it for several years now and it works OK. The lamp is not bright enough to illuminate the user. The magnification is about right for full face activities. I would have rather had a mirror that has 5x on one side and 10X (or more) on the other. If I need 1X I just use a regular wall mirror. Beyond the design shortcomings it is attractive and the chrome is decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: diymark

customer_reviews.title: Well made mirror
customer_reviews.text: Immediately changed factory bulb for 100W led acorn lamp. Should come this way from manufacturer. Otherwise a very nice mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Bob

customer_reviews.title: The installation is easy and they provide very sturdy anchors
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. I didn't realize how much I'd use it. The installation is easy and they provide very sturdy anchors. The light is very soft and flattering so looking in the magnified side is not too scary, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lele

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror mounts easily on the wall, articulates well, swivels smoothly, and is easy to use. It has become my favorite shaving mirror. I've been using it for several years now, and have never had a problem. The light makes a great night light when we have guests who use that bathroom. This is a cleanly designed and effective, good-looking addition to my bathroom. The only thing that it doesn't do well is make me look like a young, handsome man, but nobody ever said it was a magic mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Russell F.

customer_reviews.title: Wife love's it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my wife and she loves it. It gets used daily and was very easy to install. My only complaint is that I would like a little brighter light or possibly an option for a white light. Other than that it's a great product
customer_reviews.author: DBNB

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it. So much better than a table top version. Plenty of positions. Easy to install and the clear spring cord makes it easier on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lassahn

customer_reviews.title: Really like this mirror
customer_reviews.text: She really likes her new lighted mirror. I didn't use the included wall fasteners as I prefer to mount wall hanging items into a framing stud. The cord length was OK but if you're using by water or outdoors ensure that the outlet is GFI protected.
customer_reviews.author: ConcreteGuy

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you replace the bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality light but it is pretty dim. Do the LED replacement (other reviews list the size) I got one at Walmart, it's bigger but it fits and is much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Howell-Ulrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality makeup mirror
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magnifying makeup mirror and also has a regular mirror on the opposite side. It must be mounted near an outlet, but it works well at my vanity. I've had it installed for a few months now and really glad I made the purchase. The only con I can think of is that the light does get quite warm after it's been on for some time.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Give your bathroom the hotel concerierge floor feel
customer_reviews.text: The light is 20 watt so it is not very bright. I installed this in my well-lit bathroom so 20W is adequate. 5X magnification is good & clear without distortion. 8 inch size permits you to see areas without difficulty (if you've ever used a 4 inch pocket mirror you will understand ;-)) Easy to install. I needed a pencil, level, drill, hammer, and screwdriver to hang it on sheet rock. The included toggles are very large and should more than adequately support the mirror. Installation took less than 15 minutes. I spent more time than that unpacking and considering where to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: LovethedealAnne

customer_reviews.title: Too dim for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not bright enough. My instinct was to go with an LED makeup mirror but thought this would be adequate for my needs. It's really dim which is disappointing. The pictures posted make it seem brighter than it is. Easy to install and it's a nice and heavy mirror overall. I like the coiled cord which doesn't hang down and make it look neater. Overall a good mirror but if you're looking for a bright mirror then keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror
customer_reviews.text: Works well, very easy to use and install. Looks great and durable. Lighting works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Veb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and move into position
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made mirror. Folds easily but not flimsy, looks great! The light is not blinding, the magnification is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: krbshappy71

customer_reviews.title: Found this item in the Wyndham properties condo we rented ...
customer_reviews.text: Found this item in the Wyndham properties condo we rented in myrtylbeach . I had to have it , just don't turn it on the 5 power mirror side , it shows all imperfections
customer_reviews.author: powerstroke

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasts - Maybe 1-2 years max
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this mirror twice and both times it has lasted about 1.5 to 2 years in my master bathroom. The mirror is just fine, but an important element to this is the built-in light function. I bought the second one to replace the first, when the first one broke. In both cases, the small knob that turns the light on/off broke (internally) to where you cannot turn the lights on anymore. Frustrating and worth noting if you are looking to purchase. While I don't consider this an expensive product, it's not exactly something I want keep buying every other year (at least not this brand).
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: So far sturdy a quality
customer_reviews.text: Mine has been working great for 2 years. Bought it for the daughters and another for the wife they liked it so much
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the finish on this mirror. We wanted a make-up mirror that would go right next to the vanity in the girls bathroom. Some have complained that the lighting on the mirror itself is too dim. Our bathroom is well lit and she has no complaint with that. She appreciates being able to extend the arm toward her and apply her make-up more comfortably than she did while trying to lean over the sink to get closer to the vanity mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install...Light is just Ok?
customer_reviews.text: The enclosed drywall screws did not work well so I used larger more sturdy ones at the HD.I read the reviews about the light and its true...do not buy this if your expecting a bright lite because its not. Just keep in mind usually installed close to vanity where my bathroom has 6 lights so its really not necessary and the wife usually leaves it off. Seems like a very sturdy well built quality product....happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: ... I have used this mirror in upscale hotels and loved the fact that I could see how to put ...
customer_reviews.text: For years I have used this mirror in upscale hotels and loved the fact that I could see how to put on eye makeup without squinting. I finally bought one and it is just amazing! I can see every little hair on my eyebrow......... don't need to go out to a salon now to get great looking brows. This is a great gift for anyone's bathroom. I don't know why I waited so long to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma66is

customer_reviews.title: Hardware issues
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a higher review if not for the installation hardware issue I had. This was my problem: The metal wall molly that was included stripped during the tightening process. I tried using plumbers tape to give the fastener a little more surface area. Tried switching screws. These attempts did not work. I basically had to slightly oblong the end of the wall molly (slightly crimp with slip joint pliers) to get the screw to grab and collapse the molly to secure to the wall. 5 minute install turned into a frustrating 40 min. test. I would venture to say my problem was isolated and most will not have this problem. Hope my wife likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied, Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror, and it was a wonderful price. I purchased the corded version. It mounts easily and works as it said it should. The arm is a bit tight, when I position it, but I'd rather have it tight than loose. Very happy with it - have used it for about 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Kbo

customer_reviews.title: This mirror was a gift for my husband as a ...

product_meta.title: Jerdon HL65N 8-Inch Lighted Wall Mount Makeup Mirror with 5x Magnification, Nickel Finish
product_meta.description: Color:NickelThe Jerdon HL65N 8-Inch Lighted Wall Mount Mirror stands out with its sleek and modern look, while providing close-up magnification for flawless makeup application. Add a touch of glamour to your home with a makeup mirror that is used in luxury hotels and spas because of its convenience, sleek look and precise magnification. This fog free, two-sided circular mirror has an 8-inch diameter and features a smooth 360-degree swivel design that provides 1x and 5x magnification options to make sure every detail of your hair and makeup are in place. An on/off rotary knob on the oval base will activate the halo lighting around the perimeter of the mirror when you need it. The extension arm and smooth rotation adjusts to all angles for a dynamic point of view. The HL65N extends up to 14-inches from the wall and can be easily moved around, while still being firm enough to hold for odd angles. This mirror has an attractive nickel finish that protects against moisture and condensation and is designed to be wall mounted. This item comes complete with mounting hardware, a 6-foot cord with plug, and 25-watt replacement lightbulb (Jerdon model JPT25W). The Jerdon HL65N 8-Inch Wall Mount Lighted Mirror comes with a 1-year limited warranty that protects against any defects due to faulty material or workmanship. Jerdon has earned a reputation for excellence in the beauty industry with its broad range of quality cosmetic mirrors (including vanity, lighted and wall mount mirrors), hair dryers and other styling appliances. For over 40 years the Jerdon brand has been a leading provider to the finest homes, hotels, resorts, cruise ships and spas worldwide. The company continues to build its position in the market by both improving its existing line with the latest technology, developing new products and expanding its offerings to meet the growing needs of its customers.
